subject: Blast Your Way To More Sales
body:
Email marketing is still the bestway 
to reach new customers. But only if you do it 
right. If you've had lousy results from safelists and 
other cheap "blasters",well, you got what you paid for.  
 Why not try sending your emailsfrom a professional 
blaster?  Totallyworry-free and can-spam compliant.  
 We at Blast4Success have set up a newspecial co-op for those 
who would like togive email blasting a try, with absolutelyno 
commitment.  I will personally helpyou write your ad, and blast it out 
to myown hot opt-in lists anytime you want. The charge for this is $295 
for 10 millionemails, less than half the price of getting your own 
account.   We use a professional blaster in the USAfor top 
results, and everything is done 100%legally.  You do not have to worry 
aboutspam complaints, etc.  They take care ofeverything for 
us.  If you love the resultsyou get, you can repeat this mailing 
anytime, or you can get your own account, which willallow you to email 
up to 5 million peopleevery single day. Wait until you 
see what
THAT kind of marketing will 
do for your 
bottom line! Check us out at 
http://www.Blast4Success.comor contact me directly at mwest@interlog.com Let me help you make a 
LOT more money this year! Looking forward to hearing 
from you --Michelle416-789-4733 EST p.s. 
does your business card make 
you thousands every month?  

Mine does.  Ask me 
how!
